name: Dice Ailes
description: '''Dice Ailes''', born '''Shasha Damilola Alesh''', is a Nigerian singer whose musical style blends [[Afro-pop]], [[hip-hop]], and [[R&B]]. Born in [[Lagos]], Nigeria, he began his musical career in [[Toronto]], Canada. He began creating music at the age of 15.  His debut single, "Fantasy," released in 2014, garnered his position within the Afrobeat scene.
